document.discussion_title: GreenvilleOnline.com | Greenville News | The Greenville News
document.topic_text: "I've been given no reason for the entry ban, nor confirmation that this status is lasting or permanent," After nearly 20 hours of waiting, Lepeska said, he decided such clearance "probably wasn't forthcoming" On his Instagram account, he wrote, "This is not the last I will see of you, Turkey. There was no immediate comment from Turkey' Turkey'
document.post: "I've been given no reason for the entry ban, nor confirmation that this status is lasting or permanent," After nearly 20 hours of waiting, Lepeska said, he decided such clearance "probably wasn't forthcoming" On his Instagram account, he wrote, "This is not the last I will see of you, Turkey. There was no immediate comment from Turkey' Turkey'
